pr_title: Misc Fixes (Typo, Events, Adds support for blob refs in MongoDB)

timeline.message:
Adds support for using blob references in MongoDB.

There is no special daa conversion necessary, as
we simply store the blob key itself. Everything
else is handled by the properties.

Auto-populates the uri and aggregation uri.

The URI field has been added as the url field
in WebData stores the whole URL and the uri just
the relative path - with might be easier to process or
filter.
